step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your elbow straighter for maximum resistance.
Your arm position is good. Focus on keeping your elbow more extended throughout this step.
You're making a good fist and tightening your muscles. Aim for a straighter elbow to increase the pumping action.
You're opening your hand well. Try to straighten your elbow more to fully relax and maximize the fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping! Remember to stretch your arm fully overhead and keep your elbow as straight as possible. This helps pump fluid effectively.
